name.description: The name of the service to display in the DC/OS dashboard.

memory.description: Memory (in MB) to allocate to the Vamp instance.

cpu.description: CPU shares to allocate to the Vamp instance.

vamp-internal-vip.description: Internal Vamp VIP used for Vamp components.

vamp-internal-port.description: The HTTP API port for the Internal VIP.

logstash.description: Logstash host (IP), e.g.'elasticsearch.marathon.mesos'. By default Logstash should listen on 10001 UDP port.

force-pull-image.description: Force docker to re-pull the image.
